item.title: Static Web Engines
item.author: Author
item.description: For personal blogs Hugo Jekyll For documentations Docusaurus: open-sourced, good support by Facebook, good UI for navigation Readthedocs: ideal for books, like this Python book Gitbook: appropriate for team documentations Bookstack: idem, open-sourced and self-hosting Docsify: lightweight team documentation Sphinx: API docs with simplified themes, i.e. Alabaster For APIs Swagger [Doxygen]: for example, DBus [Redoc]: for example, Docker Postman
